body:
If you can OCN bridge, that would be a advantage towards other players in specific maps.
 There's peoples opinions on jitter clicking but if you're good at clicking and have good aim you should be fine.
 Need to be well coordinated with your teammates.
 And that's pretty much it.
 Hope this helped you in anyway! - Kurtiq
